doc.name: CSPSink
doc.description: A CSPSink actor accepts tokens from a single input channel. Ten tokens can be consumed for every invocation of this actor's fire() method. Once ten tokens have been received, the fire method returns. The return value of the postfire() method defaults to false.
doc.author: Neil Smyth
doc.property: The number of tokens produced by this actor. If this limit is set to -1, then produce output tokens indefinitely. The default value of this parameter is -1.
